title: GOP lawmakers, Ohio AG, want public safety a factor in bail

sentence: “The bottom line is that the decision by the [Ohio Supreme Court] is a direct threat to public safety and we are here today to fix that,” said State Sen. Theresa Gavarone.
author: Jordan Vandenberge
title: AG Yost, Republican state lawmakers push for constitutional amendment to change bail rules

sentence: "Victims deserve to know they're going to be safe from the criminals who have abused them," said state Sen. Theresa Gavarone, R-Bowling Green.
author: Laura A. Bischoff
title: 'Tough on crime' Republicans want voters to change Ohio Constitution on bail rules
